info.title: CiviQ
info.description:
The current documentation explain's how the Civiq is configured and gives and explanation for each endpoint.
CiviQ provide secure data about consultations, surveys and submissions. 

To connect a portal to the custom connector and use it in flow we need to create a connector by selecting it in the connectors list or by creating from custom connector list. 
We will need to provide the host of the portal without protocol and key. Key could be taken from configuration page.

get.description: Operation to retrieve from the portal the list of Consultations.
Operation to retrieve the consultation by the ID from the portal.
Operation to retrieve list of consultations submissions by ID from the portal.
Operation to retrieve the list of Surveys from the portal.
Operation to retrieve the survey by the ID from the portal.
Operation to retrieve list of survey submissions by ID from the portal.
Operation to retrieve the list of Applications from the portal.
Operation to retrieve the application by the ID from the portal.
Operation to retrieve list of Applications submissions by ID from the portal.

post.description: Event triggers when consultation submissions are submitted by the user through the portal.
Event triggers when consultation submissions are updated by the user through the portal.
Event triggers when consultation submissions are approved by the user through the portal.

delete.description: Event triggers to delete a webhook.

post.description: Event triggers when consultation is opened through the portal.
Event triggers when consultation is closed through the portal.
Event triggers when a user submits a submission in a webform through the portal.
Event triggers when a webform is opened through the portal.
Event triggers when a webform is closed through the portal.

get.description: Operation to retrieve a specific file from the portal.
